translations: adj.脂肪的；肥胖的；多脂肪的；脂肪过多的（fatty 的变形）

sentences.sentence: They come from the fattiest part of the animal.
sentences.translation: 这些都是动物含脂肪最高的部位。

sentences.sentence: Avoid any items on our list of the trans-fattiest foods in America.
sentences.translation: 尽量避免在美国反式脂肪酸食物列表中的食品。

sentences.sentence: They were watching me slim up, but I would be happy ordering some of the fattiest, caloric food around.
sentences.translation: 他们看着我变瘦，还看到我开心地享用高脂肪高热量的食物。
